questions.subject: OneButtonPrompt
questions.question: What features are provided in One Button Run and Upscale?

questions.subject: OneButtonPrompt
questions.question: What is the Quality Gate functionality of OneButtonPrompt?

questions.subject: OneButtonPrompt
questions.question: How does the OneButtonPrompt extension work?

questions.subject: OneButtonPrompt
questions.question: What is the URL used by default for the OneButtonPrompt?

questions.subject: OneButtonPrompt
questions.question: Where does OneButtonPrompt store the generated images?

questions.subject: OneButtonPrompt
questions.question: What is 'Don't generate, only upscale' mode?

questions.subject: OneButtonPrompt
questions.question: How can I use my own prompts with the OneButtonPrompt?

questions.subject: OneButtonPrompt
questions.question: What are the options for the 'chosen model' in the TXT2IMG settings?

answers.subject: OneButtonPrompt
answers.answer: One Button Run and Upscale allows users to generate an image with TXT2IMG, upscale the image with IMG2IMG, upscale the image with extras, and batch upscale existing images. It also features the Quality Gate functionality to ensure only the best quality images are upscaled.

answers.subject: OneButtonPrompt
answers.answer: The Quality Gate functionality of OneButtonPrompt enables users to set a quality score for images generated. It will repeat the image generation process and upscale only those images that reach the quality score. If no images reach the quality score, it will pick the image with the highest score after a specified amount of tries.

answers.subject: OneButtonPrompt
answers.answer: OneButtonPrompt uses various calls to the WebUI API with the correct parameters in the correct order to work.

answers.subject: OneButtonPrompt
answers.answer: The default URL used by OneButtonPrompt can be seen in your web browser and is typically 'http://127.0.0.1:7860'.

answers.subject: OneButtonPrompt
answers.answer: OneButtonPrompt stores generated images in the 'automated_outputs' folder in your WebUI installation directory.

answers.subject: OneButtonPrompt
answers.answer: 'Don't generate, only upscale' mode allows users to skip the TXT2IMG part of the batch and upscale all image files placed in the OneButtonPrompt's '/upscale_me/' folder. This mode also reads the original prompt and negative prompt from the image file.

answers.subject: OneButtonPrompt
answers.answer: To use your own prompts with OneButtonPrompt, enable the 'Workflow mode' in the 'Workflow assist' tab and input your prompt into the 'Workflow prompt' field. For the negative prompt, use the 'Main' tab and put it into the 'Use this negative prompt' field.

answers.subject: OneButtonPrompt
answers.answer: In the TXT2IMG settings, the options for the 'chosen model' include 'Currently Selected Model,' which uses the model currently loaded, 'all,' which randomly selects a model, or a specific model can be chosen.
